title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Great ReImagining: Thriving in the Age of AI Agents (AIM3322)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 伟大的重新构想：在AI智能体时代中蓬勃发展 (AIM3322)
abstract: Join Cathal McCarthy (CSO) covering why emergence of Agentic AI is not just another technology trend; it's a fundamental shift in how businesses will operate and compete. This session is for the leaders, the strategists, and the innovators who need to prepare their organizations for what's next. We'll explore the strategic implications of a world where every employee has a team of AI agents, and every business process is orchestrated by a network of intelligent systems built on Kore.ai's platform and Amazon's cloud-native infrastructure. You'll leave with a clear understanding of the opportunities and threats, and a framework for leading your organization through this "Great Re:Imagining". This presentation is brought to you by Kore.ai, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 加入Cathal McCarthy（首席战略官）的讲座，探讨为什么智能体AI的兴起不仅仅是另一个技术趋势；它是企业运营和竞争方式的根本性转变。本次会议面向需要为组织准备迎接未来的领导者、战略家和创新者。我们将探讨一个世界的战略影响，在这个世界中，每个员工都拥有一个AI智能体团队，每个业务流程都由基于Kore.ai平台和亚马逊云原生基础设施构建的智能系统网络进行编排。您将清楚地了解机遇和威胁，并获得引领组织度过这次"伟大重构"的框架。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kore.ai为您呈现。
